===Glyph origin===
{{Han etyl}}
{{liushu|p}}: a stone beneath a cliff ({{zh-l|*厂}}). The cliff was subsequently distorted into {{zh-l|*丆}}.

Alternatively, a cave set into the side of a cliff or mountain.
